name: Fantasy Versus
description: Fantasy Versus focuses on quick paced 4 vs.4 multiplayer battles. Find your own play style, team up and fight towards victory in Fantasy Versus!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
